timeline.message:
{561365] Richtext can save previous description into the current element

- Merge capella and diagram sections, the switch between diagram
elements and diagram blank is quicker
- Avoid unnecessary several layouts of the view
- Improve the switch between 'Already opened' and property view

in the DRepresentation, where as in 1.4.x they are persisted in the
DRepresentationDescriptor
